mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_comment(cno, reply, author, password, ano) VALUES(t_comment_no_seq.nextval, #{reply}, #{author}, #{password}, #{ano})
mapper.select: SELECT reply, author, createdAt FROM t_comment WHERE ano=#{ano}
mapper.update: UPDATE t_comment SET reply=#{reply}, author=#{author} WHERE ano=#{ano} AND password=#{password}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_comment WHERE ano=#{ano} AND password=#{password}
